column4: so the question still stands, I would like to automatically turn off my pc after a torrent file has been downloaded ?
Did You Start Downloading?
did i start downloading what ?
Well i want to start downloading and after donload is completed pc should shut down, but i do not find such option in transmission or deluge
use a command line torrent client like that: torrentclient file.torrent; shutdown -h now
will rtorrent do that  ?
Yeah I think so
No It Will Not Work
it is such a basic function strange that no gui prog on linux can do that
utorrent has that kind of option
I Will Search For A Solution
of course i know , my point was that i was surprissed linux progs dont have that option
All The Progs Are Open Source :P Edit The Source And Add That Option
ha! easier said then done, i am not a coder
I Am Searching For A Solution Bro
thanks!
http://turbobt.sourceforge.net/indexen.htm
yay! great
It Is One Of Its Features: 12. Auto shutdown computer when all finished
i can see that now i need to find the repositories
You Have To Compile It
it is en exe file
